Submission

All our books belong to a series. Please select a pertinent series and contact the series editor to see whether your work fits. We recommend you use our templates for drafting your manuscript. The initial submission should be in pdf format. In order to submit, use the submission wizard.

Note that the platform is still under development. If you have questions concerning the use of the software contact Sebastian Nordhoff.


Peer Review Process

Book manuscripts are peer-reviewed by at least two reviewers who are selected by the respective series editors. For edited volumes this review may be skipped provided the contributions in the volume have been peer-reviewed and the review process is documented.

The review process has two possible outcomes: rejection or acceptance conditional upon implementation of changes. There is no revise and resubmit, but rejected manuscripts can be resubmitted after a year. If a book is not accepted within six months after submission, it counts as rejected.

Please refer to the guidelines for details of the reviewing procedure and the user guide for an understanding of the interaction with the website.

Service providers

If there are certain parts of the manuscript creation for which you do not have the time or skills, we can recommend the following service providers: Manuscript conversion from doc to tex and application of our stylesheet:
  • Cidles.eu

Our user guide explains the tasks of the editors and the interaction with the OMP platform. Refer to the guidelines for details of the reviewing procedure.

If you want to establish a new series, please fill out the proposal form. The proposal will be sent to our advisory board. It will take about one month to take a decision.
